name: Battle zombie
description:
This is a large-scale shooting game with real military battlefields and modern military equipment. Different shooting gameplay challenges your limits!

You need to manipulate the character to constantly pass levels!

The game allows you to experience the most enjoyable shooting and various levels!

The scene of the game is full of excitement and grandeur, with stunning shooting effects that disrupt shooting routines. Various levels challenge the limits of physical fitness, providing a refreshing sense of impact!

1. Characteristics

A variety of magnificent scenes, allowing people to see characters with various characteristics and characteristics vividly.

2. Traits

The scene of the cold-blooded sharpshooter is filled with funny fun.
